name: fraud-test-vscode-logger
description: Logs detailed coding heartbeats for FRAUD-TEST comparison with hardware/device logs.

fraudTest.outputPath.description: Absolute path to write VS Code heartbeats NDJSON. If empty, defaults to <workspace>/../data/output/vscode-heartbeats.ndjson.

fraudTest.enableLogging.description: Enable or disable Fraud Test heartbeat logging.

fraudTest.minMillisecondsBetweenHeartbea.description: Minimum milliseconds between heartbeats for the same file to avoid excessive spam.
